s0021: Pass palace gate que, Wan Shi Jun must descend chariot hasten, see road horse must shi.
s0022: Son grandson become small li, come return ye, Wan Shi Jun must court robe see them, not name.
s0023: Son grandson have fault error, not scold blame, make convenient seat, face table not eat.
s0024: Then various sons mutual blame, because elder strip flesh solid thank crime, change it, then allow.
s0025: Son grandson win crown at side, though Yan dwell must crown, Shen Shen like.
s0026: Tong Pu Xin Xin like, only cautious.
s0027: Shang time grant food at home, must bow head bow prostrate eat it, like at shang front.
s0028: Their hold death, sorrow sad very mourn.
s0029: Son grandson follow teach, also like it.
s0030: Wan Shi Jun home with filial cautious hear at jun state, though Qi Lu various ru solid conduct, all self consider not reach.
s0031: Jian Yuan two years, lang zhong ling Wang Zang with literature obtain crime.
s0032: Huang tai hou with ru scholar text many quality few, now Wan Shi Jun home not speak yet body walk, then with long son Jian become lang zhong ling, young son Qing become nei shi.
s0033: Jian old white head, Wan Shi Jun still no illness.
s0034: Jian become lang zhong ling, every five days wash bathe return ye close, enter son shed, secretly ask serve, take close middle jacket toilet mat, body self wash clean, again with serve, not dare make Wan Shi Jun know, become constant.
s0035: Jian become lang zhong ling, affairs have able speak, screen person unrestrained speak, extreme cut;
s0036: Reach court see, like cannot speak.
s0037: Therefore shang then close honor ritual him.
s0038: Wan Shi Jun move dwell Ling Li.
s0039: Nei shi Qing drunk return, enter outer gate not descend chariot.
s0040: Wan Shi Jun hear, not eat.
